NL + '……' : '';\n    volInfo = volInfo.replace(\/(\\s)\\1+\/g, '$1');\n    list.push({\n      text: '🔻[ '+volsName[idx]+' ]',\n      href: 'https:\/\/translate.google.cn\/#view=home&op=translate&sl=zh-CN&tl=en&text='+encodeURIComponent(volInfo)\n    });\n    list = list.concat(chs);\n  });\n\n  return list;\n}\n\nchapterLevel(rules, opts);\n<\/js>",
